articles.title: Japanese Yen remains on the defensive, bears turn cautious amid intervention fears - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) struggles to capitalize on the previous day's modest recovery against its American counterpart from the lowest level since 1990 and edges lower during the Asian session on Thursday.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen meets with a fresh supply in the wake of the BoJ’s dovish outlook.
  • Fed Governor Waller’s hawkish comments underpin the USD, supporting USD/JPY.
